+http:/=
/(com,yahoo,groups,)/neo/groups/archive-crawler/conversations/topics

If yo=
u need something more complex, you could look at adding a org.archive.modul=
es.deciderules.MatchesListRegexDecideRule to your scope decide rule sequenc=
e since surts do not support wildcards.

Be aware that adding lots of regex=
 rules to your scope can slow down the crawler. Surts are just a prefix che=
ck and are very quick even with lots of rules.
